title: Update Failed! Getting an Unspecified error, can't update and log in. Please help!
body:
I am getting an error when i try to log into the game. an icon comes up and shows "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." 

I saw in a trending post 2 months ago, about this same problem taking place and it was said that the Windows 10 Anniversary Update 1607 was the problem, and to reinstall to the former update. I however updated to it more than 10 days ago and can no longer reinstall the former update. 

Is there anything that can be done to fix my problem? I have not been able to play in over 2 weeks. 

Thank you in advance!

replies.body:
It sounds like you're more so running into a general login error. These are often caused by either network issues or Internet Explorer security settings, which League relies on. We have a list of common solutions in our [Login Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) that I'd like you to try. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.

I have tried all of the suggestions that you have given me and it still doesn't seem to work, unfortunately.  

Is there anything else i can possibly do at this point?
